frameDefinitions: A Cognizer introduces a New_idea into society.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.
Words in this frame have to do with a Cognizer adding some Phenomenon to their model of the world.
A Whole separates into Parts, or one part of a whole, called Part_1, becomes separate from the remaining portion, Part_2.
An Agent or Cause causes a Sleeper to transition from the Sleep_state to wakeful consciousness.
frameExamples: It is difficult to imagine how different our lives would be without Edison's <t>invention</t> of the light bulb.
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
Later that night, they <t>found</t> the barely-alive victim inside the Red Hall estate flat.
This small channel meanders through marsh and wetland, <t>splitting</t> into several smaller channels that empty into Lake St. Clair.
The earthquake <t>woke</t> me from a nightmare.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with or conceptualizes the <fen>New_idea</fen>. It is normally expressed as an External Argument:
The <fen>New_idea</fen> is a concept not previously present in society which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> introduces.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with the <fen>New_idea</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with the <fen>New_idea</fen>.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person who becomes aware of a <fen>Phenomenon</fen>. It is normally expressed as an External Argument.
Thm <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the entity or situation in the world of which a <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes aware. It is normally expressed as an Object:
This role identifes the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes aware of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<fen>Topic</fen> indicates the general field within which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is found.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> uses an <fen>Instrument</fen> to (enable themselves to) become aware of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.  In some cases, the <fen>Instrument</fen> may appear in subject position.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes aware of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Whole</fen> is a single entity or an aggregate of entities which separates into <fen>Parts</fen>.
This refers collectively to the Parts resulting from separation of a Whole:
Part-1 is the first of two Parts mentioned.
Part_2 is the second of two Parts mentioned. This is usually a PP Complement.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the separation occurs.
Where the separation occurs.
The person or being that is sleeping.
The Agent is the person performing the intentional act.
An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces an effect. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of Causes.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Kim Sung</fex> invented cinnamon cheez fries in 1988.
The strong gravitic shield was discovered <fex>in 2162</fex>.
Was the light bulb invented <fex>in Austria</fex>?
<fex>Pat</fex> discovered a great little restaurant in Soho.
Pat discovered <fex>a great little restaurant</fex> in Soho.
<fex>By opening the book to page 10</fex>, you will find the Van Eerdens' number.
Scientists attempt to make discoveries <fex>about the laws of nature</fex>.
Olson says the deputy came out to the farm and detected a radioactive substance <fex>with his Geiger counter</fex>.
Robbie had wondered if they would be able to find the path <fex>at night</fex>.
<fex>Metalworkers' union</fex> to split into regional divisions
These daughter chromosomes then begin to separate <fex>from each other</fex>, each moving away from the metaphase plate and toward one of the two spindle pole regions.
Initially, <fex>the front part</fex> separated from the rest of the body.
Initially the front split <fex>from the rest of the body</fex>
However it is believed they separated <fex>at least 2 if not 3 million years ago</fex>.
The two parts likely separated <fex>above the Atlantic</fex>.
